Author: riipurr
Content:
Joyful rush brought me memories
I had hoped for their sympathies
But when the door disclosed my bloodline‚Äôs company
The breeze they gave was a chaotic symphony

Dreadful screams rang into my ears
I could shame each for all had fears
Remind me the sins of the living and perished
Deny me the pride which our blood bred and nourished

Inside the car of red wine fuel
We showed the dark how we were cruel
Mugs shattered, lies scattered
No one was catered to, but all was favored too

For each sinner was a winner
In one‚Äôs own eyes but another
Same with I, a self-loathing champion
I prayed to God for red wine to crash, spill, and burn

As to Him, we should be returned
For a rest was all I had yearned

‚Äî Rii
‚Äî 20 July 2025

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content:
Okok.

Words such as "inside the car of red wine fuel" and "mugs shattered, lies scattered" managed to draw some strong imageries. The messaging is clear for the emotions such as shame, fear, and self-loathing. The only possible weaknesses would be ambiguity that costed clarity, clich√© in the final lines (nothing wrong with that), and some of the transition feels that abrupt.
